messages.messageBody:
ok, thanks. looks to be like our city's science central. that would
be neat to try as we had an annual pass to ours and got a little
burned out from going so much, or i should say i did.

tina

that's

messages.subject: COSI - was crossing fingers
messages.msgSnippet: ... http://www.cositoledo.org A very cool hands-on science center for the whole family.  There is a section that is just for little kids that is just too cool.
messages.messageBody:
inmdcrew wrote:

>Amy,Tree Goddess:
>Hi! I was on this list aloooooooooong time ago. Stopped due to
>computer problems, death in family, etc.
>Anyways I have been lurking last 2 months.
>What is COSI? We live in Fort Wayne, IN. and if it is cool that's
>not far at all.
>
http://www.cositoledo.org

A very cool hands-on science center for the whole family. There is a
section that is just for little kids that is just too cool. We really
love going there.

TreeGoddess

messages.subject: Re: crossing fingers
messages.msgSnippet: Amy,Tree Goddess: Hi!  I was on this list aloooooooooong time ago.  Stopped due to computer problems, death in family, etc. Anyways I have been lurking last 2
messages.messageBody:
Amy,Tree Goddess:
Hi! I was on this list aloooooooooong time ago. Stopped due to
computer problems, death in family, etc.
Anyways I have been lurking last 2 months.
What is COSI? We live in Fort Wayne, IN. and if it is cool that's
not far at all.
Thanks
Tina

to go
> > again since it's been a few months since our last visit. Maybe
we could
> > meet over there sometime?
> >

>
> Sure, email me! I don't remember the ages of your kids (mine are 6
and 4yo.)
> COSI is in downtown Toledo, maybe 15-20 minutes from me on the
highway. You
> gotta check out our art museum and zoo too.
> Amy Kagey
> Usborne Books make great holiday gifts!

sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">my Usborne Books website!</A>

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] crossing fingers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/2003 1:00:45 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Sure, email me! I don t remember the ages of your kids (mine are 6 and 4yo.) COSI is in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/2003 1:00:45 AM Eastern Standard Time,
treegoddess@... writes:

>
> Amy, do you live far from COSI in Toledo? My kids are begging to go
> again since it's been a few months since our last visit. Maybe we could
> meet over there sometime?
>
>

Sure, email me! I don't remember the ages of your kids (mine are 6 and 4yo.)
COSI is in downtown Toledo, maybe 15-20 minutes from me on the highway. You
gotta check out our art museum and zoo too.
Amy Kagey
Usborne Books make great holiday gifts!
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">my Usborne Books website!</A>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
